USE electric_vehicle_ldw
GO


EXEC silver.usp_silver_vehicle_registration '2024', '01' GO
EXEC silver.usp_silver_vehicle_registration '2024', '02' GO
EXEC silver.usp_silver_vehicle_registration '2024', '03' GO
EXEC silver.usp_silver_vehicle_registration '2024', '04' GO
EXEC silver.usp_silver_vehicle_registration '2024', '05' GO
EXEC silver.usp_silver_vehicle_registration '2024', '06' GO
EXEC silver.usp_silver_vehicle_registration '2024', '07' GO
EXEC silver.usp_silver_vehicle_registration '2024', '08' GO
EXEC silver.usp_silver_vehicle_registration '2024', '09' GO
EXEC silver.usp_silver_vehicle_registration '2024', '10' GO
EXEC silver.usp_silver_vehicle_registration '2024', '11' GO
EXEC silver.usp_silver_vehicle_registration '2025', '01' GO
EXEC silver.usp_silver_vehicle_registration '2024', '02' GO
EXEC silver.usp_silver_vehicle_registration '2024', '05' GO
EXEC silver.usp_silver_vehicle_registration '2024', '04' GO


/*
--Crea la tabla "vehicle_registration" a partir de un directorio con archivos particionados 
IF OBJECT_ID('silver.vehicle_registration') IS NOT NULL DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.vehicle_registration  --si existe la tabla externa, la elimina
GO

 CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.vehicle_registration
     WITH (
        DATA_SOURCE = electric_vehicle_src,             --https://entixcoviddl.dfs.core.windows.net/electric-vehicle-data/
        LOCATION = 'silver/vehicle_registration',       --carpeta donde se almacenar√° el resultado de la ingesta y transformacion de datos   
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format               --NO guarda los archivos particionados pero se puede forzar con un procedimiento almacenado
    )
AS
SELECT * FROM bronze.vehicle_registration_csv
GO

SELECT * FROM silver.vehicle_registration
GO
*/
